query:
UPDATE withdrawals
            SET is_finalized = true
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    UNNEST($1::bytea[]) as tx_hash,
                    UNNEST($2::integer[]) as event_index_in_tx
            ) as u
        WHERE
            withdrawals.tx_hash = u.tx_hash
        AND
            withdrawals.event_index_in_tx = u.event_index_in_tx
